description:
Japan`s shooting game champion Fried Chicken Lemons and Momoka battle over a two-shot photo!
Momoka becomes overweight after eating too many sweet rolls.
Momoka plots to rid her house of the mysterious creature Platy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boy Meets Girl of Destiny (lol) / Pigs Who Mock the Will to Lose Weight / My Platy House
Destined (LOL) boy meets girl – La truie qui veut maigrir – Kamo tape l`incruste
Unmei (Warau) no Boy Meets Girl www / Yaseru Ishi o Warau Buta yo / Kamo na My House
